original: Majjhima Nikāya 103
Kintisutta
Evaṁ me sutaṁ—
ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā pisinārāyaṁ viharati baliharaṇe vanasaṇḍe.
analyzed: ▁ekaṃ ▁samay aṃ ▁bhagavā ▁ pi si nā rā yaṃ ▁viharati ▁bal i haraṇ e ▁ vanasaṇḍ e

original: Tatra kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi:
“bhikkhavo”ti.
“Bhadante”ti te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ.
analyzed: ▁bha dant eti ▁te ▁bhikkhū ▁bhagavato ▁pacc ass o su ṃ

original: Bhagavā etadavoca:
“kinti vo, bhikkhave, mayi hoti:
‘cīvarahetu vā samaṇo gotamo dhammaṁ deseti, piṇḍapātahetu vā samaṇo gotamo dhammaṁ
deseti, senāsanahetu vā samaṇo gotamo dhammaṁ deseti, itibhavābhavahetu vā samaṇo
analyzed: ▁des eti ▁senāsan ahetu ▁vā ▁samaṇ o ▁gotamo ▁dhammaṃ ▁des eti ▁iti bhav ā bhav ahetu ▁vā ▁samaṇ o

original: gotamo dhammaṁ desetī’”ti?
“Na kho no, bhante, bhagavati evaṁ hoti:
‘cīvarahetu vā samaṇo gotamo dhammaṁ deseti, piṇḍapātahetu vā samaṇo gotamo dhammaṁ
deseti, senāsanahetu vā samaṇo gotamo dhammaṁ deseti, itibhavābhavahetu vā samaṇo
analyzed: ▁des eti ▁senāsan ahetu ▁vā ▁samaṇ o ▁gotamo ▁dhammaṃ ▁des eti ▁iti bhav ā bhav ahetu ▁vā ▁samaṇ o

original: gotamo dhammaṁ desetī’”ti.
“Na ca kira vo, bhikkhave, mayi evaṁ hoti:
‘cīvarahetu vā samaṇo gotamo dhammaṁ deseti …pe…
itibhavābhavahetu vā samaṇo gotamo dhammaṁ desetī’ti;
analyzed: ▁iti bhav ā bhav ahetu ▁vā ▁samaṇ o ▁gotamo ▁dhammaṃ ▁des etīti

original: atha kinti carahi vo, bhikkhave, mayi hotī”ti?
“Evaṁ kho no, bhante, bhagavati hoti:
‘anukampako bhagavā hitesī;
anukampaṁ upādāya dhammaṁ desetī’”ti.
“Evañca kira vo, bhikkhave, mayi hoti:
‘anukampako bhagavā hitesī;
anukampaṁ upādāya dhammaṁ desetī’ti.
Tasmātiha, bhikkhave, ye vo mayā dhammā abhiññā desitā, seyyathidaṁ—
cattāro satipaṭṭhānā cattāro sammappadhānā cattāro iddhipādā pañcindriyāni pañca
balāni satta bojjhaṅgā ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo, tattha sabbeheva samaggehi sammodamānehi
analyzed: ▁bal āni ▁satta ▁bojjhaṃg ā ▁ariy o ▁aṭṭhaṃgik o ▁maggo ▁tattha ▁sabbe heva ▁samagg ehi ▁sam mod amān ehi

original: avivadamānehi sikkhitabbaṁ.
Tesañca vo, bhikkhave, samaggānaṁ sammodamānānaṁ avivadamānānaṁ sikkhataṁ siyaṁsu dve bhikkhū abhidhamme nānāvādā.
analyzed: ▁te s añca ▁vo ▁bhikkhave ▁samagg ānaṃ ▁sam mod amān ānaṃ ▁avi va d amān ānaṃ ▁sikkh ataṃ ▁si yaṃ su ▁dve ▁bhikkhū ▁abhidhamm e ▁nānā vād ā

original: Tatra ce tumhākaṁ evamassa:
‘imesaṁ kho āyasmantānaṁ atthato ceva nānaṁ byañjanato ca nānan’ti, tattha yaṁ bhikkhuṁ suvacataraṁ maññeyyātha so upasaṅkamitvā evamassa vacanīyo:
analyzed: ▁imesaṃ ▁kho ▁āyasmant ānaṃ ▁atthato ▁ceva ▁n ānaṃ ▁byañjan ato ▁ca ▁nā nanti ▁tattha ▁yaṃ ▁bhikkhuṃ ▁su va ca tar aṃ ▁maññ eyyātha ▁so ▁upasaṃkamitvā ▁evam assa ▁ vacanīy o

original: ‘āyasmantānaṁ kho atthato ceva nānaṁ, byañjanato ca nānaṁ.
Tadamināpetaṁ āyasmanto jānātha—
analyzed: ▁tada mi nā pe taṃ ▁āyasmant o ▁jān ā tha

original: yathā atthato ceva nānaṁ, byañjanato ca nānaṁ.
Māyasmanto vivādaṁ āpajjitthā’ti.
